synopsis.text:
Will ow-graced runways transform into blood-soaked battlegrounds for the stunning supermodel, Jun Fudo, as she uncovers her chilling heritage in the form of a beastly power. Unbeknownst to her, Jun's veins carry the next stage of human evolution, a secret she shares with monstrous creatures terrorizing the city.

Enter Asuka Ran, a government agent with a clandestine agenda, who recruits Jun to exterminate her own kind. As Devilman Lady, she teeters on the edge of sanity, struggling to maintain her humanity amidst the chaos. With her newfound abilities, Jun must hunt down the savage beasts while grappling with the reality of her unwanted destiny.

As the body count rises and the line between human and monster blurs, Jun faces the ultimate question: Can she retain her humanity and regain control of her fate, or will she succumb to the darkness within?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
